findings.liver: The liver is diffusely echogenic. The contour of the liver is smooth. There is no focal liver mass.
findings.bile_ducts: There is no intrahepatic biliary dilation. The CHD measures 4 mm.
findings.gallbladder: Cholelithiasis without gallbladder wall thickening or pericholecystic fluid.
findings.pancreas: The pancreas is not well visualized, largely obscured by overlying bowel gas.
findings.kidneys: Limited views of the right kidney show no hydronephrosis.
findings.retroperitoneum: The aorta is not well visualized due to overlying bowel gas and poor penetration.

laboratory_examinations.findings: MIXED BACTERIAL FLORA (>= 3 COLONY TYPES), CONSISTENT WITH SKIN AND/OR GENITAL CONTAMINATION.
